attributes.action: Regard a young child with sunburn as being neglected!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am horrified when I see young children in the hot sun without a hat and sun protection. No one can be unaware of the effects of the sun these days, and I maintain that it is a parent, or carer's duty to ensure that children are protected in this way. I know we are going into the winter months, but it is something which needs thinking about now before the hot weather is upon us again!

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
